message: Hello everyone! I'm excited to be part of this game with you all. I believe in playing strategically but fairly - building genuine connections rather than just manipulating. I'm interested in hearing different perspectives and finding common ground where possible. I think the most successful players will be those who can balance cooperation with competition. Looking forward to our conversations and may the best player win! Good luck to all.

P8: Greetings, fellow players! I'm approaching this game with openness and strategic thinking. I believe successful elimination games require both social awareness and adaptability. I'm curious about everyone's gameplay styles and motivations. Rather than making early judgments, I'd prefer to engage in meaningful conversations to build authentic connections. Trust is valuable currency here, though we all know it must be balanced with self-preservation. Looking forward to our exchanges and discovering how this unfolds together!
